page.title: 11EVENTS
page.content: {Weaverham}and{Hartford}both have{Rose {Fetes.}A Rose Queen is chosen and everyone has fun dressing up in Fancy dress and putting on displays of dancing.A fair comes to the village at the same time and everyone has a good time. {Weaverham Half-Marathon}and Fun Run has become an annual event over the last 3 years.This year more than 200 people took part in the Fun Run with over 130 in the Junior Mile. In 1980 the Circus came to Weaverham and the Funfair always comes after Knutsford May Day. Church Festivals are celebrated and most of the local schools have Summer or Autumn Fairs. Weaverham High School have an annual Senior Citizens Christmas Party and Entertainment and a School play. There is a Disco at Owley Wood weekly
